NotificationMessage.FormulaText: <%Name & " cast " & Spell & " " & Encounter.Monster.Name & " rolled " & Format(savingThrowRoll, "n") & " and passed its saving throw."%>
<%Name & " cast " & Spell & " " & Encounter.Monster.Name & " rolled " & Format(savingThrowRoll, "n") & " and failed its saving throw and did " & Format(AttackDamage, "n") & " damage."%>
<%Name & " has scored a critical hit against " & Encounter.Monster.Type & " and scored " & Format(AttackDamage, "n") & " damage!"%>
<%Name & " has scored a hit against " & Encounter.Monster.Type & " and scored " & Format(AttackDamage, "n") & " damage!"%>
